entry.summary:
Vendor: Bluorng
Type: T-SHIRT
Price: 4700.00

Description

The Black Saber T-Shirt possesses the untamed energy of the night, in which each beat creates a mad frenzy. The saber tooth graphic is an expression of pure strength and high energy scenes, the excitement and intensity of the final set of life. It is an utterance of fearless motion, and is made to suit those who live to the beat of the press.

Made of high quality heavyweight cotton, this oversized concert tee has a traditional round neck, drop shoulder and fitted fit with breathable comfort that stands the test of time. This saber-tooth graphic stands out on a deep black base and has a bold street-ready look.

Wear it with ripped jeans, overstated streetwear or cargos to create a festival-appropriate, stage-to-the-streets outfit.
